Colorado_Springs.Knob Hill, Colorado:
Knob Hill, is a neighborhood of Colorado Springs in El Paso County, Colorado, is located northeast of downtown Colorado Springs.


== History ==


=== Colorado School for the Deaf and Blind ===

The Colorado Institute of the Education of the Mutes (now Colorado School for the Deaf and Blind) was founded by Jonathan R. Kennedy and opened in April 8, 1874. The school began with a Territorial appropriation of $5,000.
